评论详情: I love this purse. It comes with a shoulder strap but I don't personally use it. I just use the handles. It's large enough that I can fit everything I need into it. 类型: Style: Call of the Phoenix Black
评论详情: I get complaints on this purse all the time. I have a tuxedo cat and have always been a black cat kind of person so any cat lovers with a black cat would love this. The purse is also GIANT I was not expecting it to be as big as it is. I love all the room there is. There is 2 different divided sides which makes it easy to organize. You can wear it multiple different ways as a shoulder bag a cross body bag or just use the handles like a hand bag. This is my most favorite purse I've ever owned and would 10 out of 10 definitely recommend and purchase again and again. It's also really cheap for how good of quality it is how beautiful it is how big it is and how versatile it is. This sounds like a paid review but im just a very happy customer. I'm 100% going to be buying more from the seller.
My husband got this for me and I love it!  Very spacious!

I was having bad luck with purses, most being made of cheap material and not capable of holding a lot, which is kinda the purpose of a purse. I bought this one since I saw a lot of good reviews, and I'm so happy that I did! The quality of the purse is so incredibly great and I have had no issues with using it every day. My only critique was that the pictures all show a long strap on the purse, which I assumed was included, but in actuality was not included.

评论详情: I LOVE THIS PURSE!!!!!! I've been meaning to post a review forever ago.....I bought this purse for myself as a Christmas gift.... it's one of the best things I've ever purchased for myself.... the quality is superb I'm very impressed... would buy again

I love this purse. I really like the little embossed spiders on the main part of the purse. It's good quality. On the bigger side. There is a zip pouch inside and pockets. I'm probably going to get the kitty one next! Shipped quickly also.
This was a xmas gift for my mother. It's bigger than expected but not complaining. She loves it.

I got this purse as a gift from my wishlist, I was wanting something with a good amount of space. It's a decent size if you want a nice big purse, the style is beautiful and doesn't feel cheap. The inside middle pocket zipper isn't as long as the width of the purse so it feels a little narrow when I go digging through it, but since I'm pretty much happy with everything else I'm not too bothered by it. The zipper pocket on the exterior back of the purse is big enough to fit my Galaxy S10, any phone that's larger wouldn't work if you want to have it zipped up. I'm able to fit my IPad and Switch case, and if I can get my large water bottle and some other stuff in there when I don't care about zipping the purse up. Overall I love it, if you want a purse big enough to take books, tablets and whatnot I would recommend this!

Me encanta!! Es súper bonito

Sac de belle qualité, matériaux et coutures solides. Peut être porté à la main, sur le bras, l'épaule ou en bandoulière, système d'attache de la bandoulière solide, enlevable et réglable. Grande capacité de stockage, mais ce n'est pas un fourre-tout : plusieurs poches permettent un rangement organisé et un accès facile. Personnellement j'ai craquée sur le design du couple de chat à la belle étoile... sur les photos je pensais qu'il était noir uni alors qu'en fait il y a des têtes de chats un peu partout, je suis sous le charme... J'aurai aimé que le motif principal cache une poche supplémentaire mais c'est vraiment un détail y a largement de poche pour tout ce que j'ai à y mettre.
La adoro, è la mia borsa preferita. La consiglio vivamente
